DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess safety tolerability combine treatment atacicept rituximab subject active rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) receive re-treatment rituximab .
DOC.brief_title: Atacicept Combination With Rituximab Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis ( August III )
DOC.criteria: Male female subject Greater equal ( > = ) 18 year age time Informed Consent Who rheumatoid arthritis satisfying American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criteria disease history least 12 month Subjects must active disease define DAS28 > 3.2 Subjects must receive previous treatment rituximab must candidate retreatment rituximab Female subject childbearing potential must willing avoid pregnancy use adequate method contraception 4 week study day 1 ( SD1 ) , treatment period 12 month last dose rituximab , must negative urine pregnancy test screen visit SD1 Other protocol define inclusion criterion could apply Current neurological disease exclude migraine Inflammatory joint disease rheumatoid arthritis Any contraindication rituximab per national label Use diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARDs ; include methotrexate ) less 3 month change dose regimen within 28 day SD1 , methotrexate dose regimen > 25 mg/week Participation interventional clinical trial within 1 month SD1 ( within 5 halflives investigate compound SD1 , whichever long ) Prednisone dose regimen > 10 mg/day ( equivalent ) , change steroid dose regimen within 28 day SD1 Active latent tuberculosis within year screen major infection require hospitalization intravenous antiinfectives within 28 day SD1 Serum Immunoglobulin G ( IgG ) 6 gram per liter ( g/L ) Known hypersensitivity atacicept component formulate atacicpet Known hypersensitivity rituximab , component formulate rituximab murine protein Breastfeeding pregnancy Other protocol define exclusion criterion could apply
